title: Fish Dish
description:
Black steatite toilet dish of fish form. Convex surface decorated with incised scale pattern. Dish area includes entire body and is decorated with irregular lines indicating water.
Condition: Very slight chips on rim.
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Alastair B. Martin

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
